snippet: Speaking to Fox News, President Bashar al-Assad compared his use of force in Syria to American efforts to quell the Los Angeles riots in 1992.
abstract: Speaking to Fox News, President Bashar al-Assad compared his use of force in Syria to American efforts to quell the Los Angeles riots in 1992.

headline.main: Syria Releases Video of Fox News Interview With Assad
